queries.sql: SELECT intCol FROM {tbl} GROUP BY intCol
SELECT strCol, boolCol FROM {tbl} GROUP BY strCol, boolCol
SELECT strCol, boolCol FROM {tbl} GROUP BY boolCol, strCol
SELECT strCol FROM {tbl} GROUP BY strCol, boolCol
SELECT boolCol FROM {tbl} GROUP BY strCol, boolCol
SELECT DISTINCT intCol, doubleCol FROM {tbl} ORDER BY doubleCol
SELECT intCol FROM {tbl} GROUP BY intCol ORDER BY intCol
SELECT DISTINCT strCol, boolCol, intCol FROM {tbl} ORDER BY intCol
SELECT strCol, boolCol FROM {tbl} GROUP BY strCol, boolCol ORDER BY boolCol
SELECT strCol, boolCol FROM {tbl} GROUP BY boolCol, strCol ORDER BY strCol
SELECT strCol FROM {tbl} GROUP BY strCol, boolCol ORDER BY boolCol
SELECT boolCol FROM {tbl} GROUP BY strCol, boolCol ORDER BY boolCol
